name: ClaimInquire
title: Inquire Prior Authorization Status
description: Inquire about the status of a prior authorization request using the authorization reference or claim identifier. Returns the current ClaimResponse and any associated Task status.
comment: This operation allows providers to check the status of submitted prior authorization requests. The inquiry can be made using either the authorization reference number returned from the $submit operation or the original claim identifier.

parameter.name: identifier
parameter.documentation: The business identifier of the original claim submission

parameter.name: authorizationReference
parameter.documentation: The authorization reference number returned from the $submit operation

parameter.name: patient
parameter.documentation: Reference to the patient for additional filtering

parameter.name: response
parameter.documentation: Bundle containing the current ClaimResponse and any associated Task resources showing processing status
